abstract: Wal-Mart Stores said it was cooperating with an investigation into possible insider trading related to its takeover of the Japanese retail chain Seiyu.
snippet: Wal-Mart Stores said it was cooperating with an investigation into possible insider trading related to its takeover of the Japanese retail chain Seiyu.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart Stores, the world’s biggest retailer, said it was cooperating with an investigation into possible insider trading related to its takeover of the Japanese retail chain Seiyu, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Unit Involved in Japan Insider Trade Probe
